name: Mozilla Firefox
description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser developed by Mozilla. Firefox has been the second most popular web since January,2018

name: Google Chrome
description: Google Chrome is a web browser developed by Google, released in 2008. Chrome is the world's most popular web browser today.

name: Opera GX
description: Opera GX is a gaming-oriented counterpart of Opera. The browser was announced and released in early access for Windows on 11 June 2019, during E3 2019.
